surface_coverage_hydroxylation module

All results related to adsorption models are presented here.

surface_coverage_hydroxylation.comp_ads(T, x_H2O, x_O2, E_ads_H2O, E_ads_O2, P)

Competitive adsorption model

Parameters:

  • T (float or numpy array) – Temperature or temperature window in Kelvins.

  • x_H2O (float) – Water vapour partial pressure

  • x_O2 (float) – Oxygen gas partial pressure

  • E_ads_H2O (float) – Water molecule energy in J/mol from DFT

  • E_ads_O2 (float) – Oxygen molecule energy in J/mol from DFT

  • P (float) – Total pressure that defaults to the ambient total pressure of 1 atm/Bar

Returns:

Returns a tuple of four elements of same type as T: oxygen surface coverage, water surface coverage, oxygen gas chemical potential in J/mol, water vapour chemical potential in J/mol.

Return type:

tuple of length 4
